action.text: Amendment SA 4927, previously agreed to, was modified by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4927 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 4927 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator DeMint to Amendment SA 4921. (consideration: CR S9287-9288) Of a perfecting nature.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4927 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4927 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator DeMint to Amendment SA 4921.
